sources.title: Millie (1931)
sources.description: After a tumultuous first marriage, Millie Blake learns to love her newfound independence and drags her feet on the possibility of remarriage. The years pass, and now Millie's daughter garners the attentions of men - men who once devoted their time to her mother. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/millie-1931/

sources.title: Millie (1931) [Colorized, 4k, 60fps]
sources.description: Millie is a 1931 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: Millie (1931) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Helen Twelvetrees, Joan Blondell, Lilyan Tashman
 Director: John Francis Dillon

 Millie Blake has a love affair that goes wrong, so Millie plays the field recklessly from that point on. When she finds out that one of the reckless players from her past has now cast his spell on her daughter, she takes matters into her own hands and finds herself in a courtroom trying to find a better defense plea than mother-love and honor-protection.

sources.title: Millie (1931) Drama, Romance Pre Code Film
sources.description:
She hurled a woman's laughing scorn into the face of men, "Get all you can and treat 'em like tramps..they're all alike.  Millie's life begins to crumble when she finds out her husband is having an affair.
 
Director: John Francis Dillon
Writers: Donald Henderson Clarke, Charles Kenyon 
Stars: Helen Twelvetrees, Lilyan Tashman, Robert Ames 
Genres: Drama, Romance, Pre Code
